overview: When a young man catches his best friend having an affair with his mother, he runs off disgusted and humiliated. But later, discovers that his best friend's mother also has a dark, sensual side, and soon falls under her erotic spell. Starring two of the hottest MILF superstars in erotic films, Julia Ann and Kendra Lust, with Seth Gamble and James Deen as the mother-trading son.
title: Mother Exchange
